dc_title_s: Map of the eastern and middle states &c. and also the British Provinces
dc_description_s: Shows railroads and canals.; "Entered according to Act of Congress, in the year 1848, by W. Williams in the Clerk's Office, of the District Court of the Southern District of New York."; "Engraved on steel to show the connection of the sectional maps in Appletons' Hand Book of American Travel."; Insets: Land and water routes from Cleveland to Detroit & Chicago -- Falls of Niagara.; Removed from text: Appletons' illustrated hand-book of American travel / By T. Addison Richards (New York : D. Appleton, 1857-1860).|27 x 40 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:3,700,000|General Map Collection
